title:
Walker's Razor Slim Earmuffs; Dynamic shooting range high-definition speakers; sound-activated compression reaction of 0.02 seconds with independent volume controls;
Noise reduction 23 dB; 2 omnidirectional microphones; audio input jack; recessed volume control knobs; 2 AAA batteries (included); size: 8.10 x 4.60 x 10.60 inches; weight: 0.98 pounds
descriptions:
Introducing Walker's Razor Slim Earmuffs, the ultimate companion for your shooting range adventures! These earmuffs feature dynamic high-definition speakers that provide crystal clear sound quality, allowing you to hear every detail with precision.

With a lightning-fast sound-activated compression reaction time of just 0.02 seconds and independent volume controls, you can customize your listening experience to suit your needs. The 23 dB noise reduction rating ensures that harmful noises are kept at bay, protecting your ears while still allowing you to hear important sounds around you.

Equipped with 2 omnidirectional microphones, an audio input jack, and recessed volume control knobs, these earmuffs offer convenience and versatility. The sleek design, powered by 2 AAA batteries (included), measures 8.10 x 4.60 x 10.60 inches and weighs only 0.98 pounds, making them comfortable to wear for extended periods.

The comfortable headband with a metal wire frame is foldable for easy storage, making these earmuffs the perfect choice for shooters on the go. Don't compromise on safety or comfort – choose Walker's Razor Slim Earmuffs for your next shooting session!

Experience the ultimate in hearing protection with Walker's Razor Slim Earmuffs! These earmuffs feature dynamic shooting range high-definition speakers for crystal-clear sound, along with sound-activated compression reaction in just 0.02 seconds. With independent volume controls, noise reduction of 23 dB, 2 omnidirectional microphones, and an audio input jack, these earmuffs are perfect for any shooting range enthusiast.

The recessed volume control knobs make adjusting the sound levels a breeze, while the included 2 AAA batteries ensure you're always ready to go. Lightweight at just 0.98 pounds and with dimensions of 8.10 x 4.60 x 10.60 inches, these earmuffs are comfortable to wear for long periods. The metal wire frame headband adds to the comfort, and the foldable design makes them easy to store when not in use.

Don't compromise on your hearing protection - choose Walker's Razor Slim Earmuffs for a shooting experience like no other!
